apiInfo.title: Hadba API
apiInfo.description: The REST APIs implementation for the `hadba` WebApp. This is the `v5` revision, a complete rewrite in **nodejs**. The reason for the rewrite is to make it platform agnostic and an get it **SaaS** ready. You can play with the APIs with this access token `adfjea23kj`, it will give only read access. Collaboration are welcomed.
